  • Constructor Details

    • MultiPlayerGameHandler

      public MultiPlayerGameHandler​(java.util.List<ClientHandler> clientHandlers)
      Initialises game instance ad turn manager, setting it to multiplayer mode. Adds players to the game
      Parameters:
      clientHandlers - list of client handlers

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Administers the game, looping on players and checking at the ent of each turn of someone's reach the end of faith path or bought seven development cards
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • sendLeaderCards

      public void sendLeaderCards()
      Parses leader cards and puts them in a Stack. After shuffling the stack, sends an ArrayList of 4 leader cards to all clients.
